actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to provide drought relief to agricultural producers by requiring that deficiency payments paid to producers for the 1988 crop year in counties declared disaster areas be based on 92 percent of the projected payment rate, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to provide producers of the 1988 crops of wheat, feed grains, upland cotton, and rice in disaster-designated counties with 92 percent of the deficiency payments projected at the beginning of the crop year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to provide drought relief to agricultural producers by requiring that deficiency payments paid to producers for the 1988 crop year in counties declared disaster areas be based on 92 percent of the projected payment rate, and for other purposes.
